Articles.Content:
Hi guys and gals,

I checked the forum search engine but I didn't (or couldn't) see anything,

or announcements regarding mission control, I ask because I see a

mission control building there at KSC but just wondering how its going

to work and how soon can we expect that ! Because it would be really nice

to have mission control to plan the flight rather than having to get into

parking orbit first, or know when is the best window for launching !

Happy launches !

It has been discussed, many times and is on the what not to suggest list (More types of launch facitilies).

I do agree though. The tracking center could double as an awesome mission control. I believe the devs have things planned along these lines. Especially with career mode coming, their bound to make some changes.
This wasn't about a new launch facility, but more about easier planning.

This isn't about more types of launch facilities at all. The mission control is included at KSC,

I was just wondering what can we expect !
